mapper.select:
SELECT SI.SHOES_NO , SI.SHOES_ID , SI.SHOES_NUMBER , SI.IS_ASSIGN , SI.BATTERY , SI.REG_DATE , SI.UPD_DATE FROM ST_SHOES_INFO SI WHERE REG_DATE >= #{startDt} AND REG_DATE <= #{endDt} ORDER BY SI.REG_DATE
LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_SHOES_INFO ( SHOES_ID , SHOES_NUMBER , IS_ASSIGN , BATTERY , REG_DATE , UPD_DATE ) VALUES (#{shoesId}, #{shoesNumber},#{isAssign}, #{battery}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'))
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_SHOES_INFO SET SHOES_ID = #{shoesId}, SHOES_NUMBER = #{shoesNumber}, IS_ASSIGN = #{isAssign}, BATTERY = #{battery}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName}, UPD_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') WHERE SHOES_NO = #{shoesNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_CD , CODE_NM , CODE_VALUE , GRUP_CD , CODE_SEQ FROM ST_CODE WHERE GRUP_CD = #{grupCd} ORDER BY CODE_SEQ;
